titles.title: Requesting the President to transmit to the House of Representatives certain information relating to plan assets and liabilities of single-employer pension plans.
Requesting the President to transmit to the House of Representatives certain information relating to plan assets and liabilities of single-employer pension plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported Unfavorably by Unanimous Consent.
Reported adversely by the Committee on Education and the Workforce. H. Rept. 109-34.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 19.

bill.summary: Requests the President to transmit to the House of Representatives certain information relating to plan assets and liabilities of single-employer pension plans.
